CancelServiceUsage.title: CancelServiceUsage
CancelServiceUsage.summary: Cancels the application for using a service.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group of a cloud resource based on the resource ID.

CheckServiceDeployable.title: CheckServiceDeployable
CheckServiceDeployable.summary: Performs a precheck before deploying a service instance.

ContinueDeployServiceInstance.title: ContinueDeployServiceInstance
ContinueDeployServiceInstance.summary: Continues to deploy a service instance after the service instance failed to be deployed.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Create backup for Compute Nest instance

CreateServiceInstance.title: CreateServiceInstance
CreateServiceInstance.summary: Creates and deploys a service instance.

CreateServiceUsage.title: CreateServiceUsage
CreateServiceUsage.summary: Creates an application for using a service.

DeleteServiceInstances.title: DeleteServiceInstances
DeleteServiceInstances.summary: Deletes service instances based on the region ID and service instance IDs.

GenerateServicePolicy.title: GenerateServicePolicy
GenerateServicePolicy.summary: Queries the missing policies before creating a service instance.

GetBackup.title: GetBackup
GetBackup.summary: Queries the information about backup task.

GetService.title: GetService
GetService.summary: Queries the information about a service.

GetServiceEstimateCost.title: GetServiceEstimateCost
GetServiceEstimateCost.summary: Queries the estimated price for creating a service instance.

GetServiceInstance.title: GetServiceInstance
GetServiceInstance.summary: Queries the information about a service instance based on the region ID and the ID of the service instance or the Alibaba Cloud Marketplace instance. Information including the service status, template name, and involved resources are returned.

GetServiceInstanceSubscriptionEstimateCo.title: GetServiceInstanceSubscriptionEstimateCost
GetServiceInstanceSubscriptionEstimateCo.summary: Inquiries the prices of subscription resources for private service instances. Renewal price inquiry is supported. You can make a unified renewal price inquiry for all subscription resources based on a specific service instance ID or make a renewal price inquiry for a specific resource. You can specify a service instance ID or a resource in a request, but cannot specify both of them.

GetServiceProvisions.title: GetServiceProvisions
GetServiceProvisions.summary: Queries the information about the activation status and Resource Access Management (RAM) roles of the cloud services required by a service.

GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints.title: GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints
GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints.summary: Queries the constraints on the parameters in a Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) template in a region based on the template name and service ID.

GetUserInformation.title: GetUserInformation
GetUserInformation.summary: Queries the information about a customer.

ListBackups.title: ListBackups
ListBackups.summary: Query and list Compute Nest instance backups

ListServiceInstanceLogs.title: ListServiceInstanceLogs
ListServiceInstanceLogs.summary: Queries the deployment and upgrade logs of a service instance.

ListServiceInstanceResources.title: ListServiceInstanceResources
ListServiceInstanceResources.summary: Queries the resources contained in a service instance.

ListServiceInstanceUpgradeHistory.title: ListServiceInstanceUpgradeHistory
ListServiceInstanceUpgradeHistory.summary: Queries the upgrade history of a service instance.

ListServiceUsages.title: ListServiceUsages
ListServiceUsages.summary: Queries the applications for using a service.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of a tag key.

RenewServiceInstanceResources.title: RenewServiceInstanceResources
RenewServiceInstanceResources.summary: Renews the subscription resources that are included in a private service instance. You can renew all subscription resources included in a private service instance based on the ID of the private service instance. You can also renew specific resources included in a private service instance. You can use only one of the preceding renewal methods.

RestartServiceInstance.title: RestartServiceInstance
RestartServiceInstance.summary: Restarts a service instance that is in the Deployed state.

RollbackServiceInstance.title: RollbackServiceInstance
RollbackServiceInstance.summary: Rolls back an upgraded service instance to the previous version.

StartServiceInstance.title: StartServiceInstance
StartServiceInstance.summary: Starts a service instance that is in the Stopped or StartFailed state.

StopServiceInstance.title: StopServiceInstance
StopServiceInstance.summary: Stops a service instance that is in the Deployed or StopFailed state.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to a specified resource list.

UpdateServiceInstanceAttributes.title: UpdateServiceInstanceAttributes
UpdateServiceInstanceAttributes.summary: Updates the attributes of a service instance.

UpdateServiceInstanceSpec.title: UpdateServiceInstanceSpec
UpdateServiceInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the configurations of a service instance.

UpdateServiceUsage.title: UpdateServiceUsage
UpdateServiceUsage.summary: Updates the application for using a service.

UpdateUserInformation.title: UpdateUserInformation
UpdateUserInformation.summary: Updates the information about a customer.

UpgradeServiceInstance.title: UpgradeServiceInstance
UpgradeServiceInstance.summary: Upgrades the version of a service instance.
